common: we dealin wit some very critical and crucial times some of the most critical and crucial times ive ever seen i was on stoney island with my guy he was tryin to tell me about the s-i-e experience tried to tell him about the c-s-e experience you know  yo im the rap profession i go the session study mcs like a god do lessons mic testin in the rain i brainstorm you feelin me out nigga we got the same form i drop heavy in spots you scared to put your weight theres only so much ice you can skate on shit cats write for you you say wrong no time to debate on whos your pop and whos not or who shot big and 2pac or who this stud fuckin or how much this crew got thats ho shit that aint me or the type of niggas i roll wit i cold get dumb like a brother in prison who hasnt had a chance to hold his son sacrificin like abe did his oldest son tryin to hold my come i think of raps seen the bdp cover and i start thinkin back to  * silly hoes sample* say what like they used to say kool g rap and polo back again
